public abstract class ScheduledNotificationJobTemplate
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.quartz.Job

This class serves as the parent of all the job classes scheduled by scheduler component.

execute

public final void execute(org.quartz.JobExecutionContext context)
                   throws org.quartz.JobExecutionException
Will reload the Report identified by report.id and ScheduledNotification identified by scheduledNotification.id, in JobDetail data map(JobDataMap). This method will then check the present status of the AdverseEventReport, and if found ReportStatus.PENDING, will call the processNotification() function, otherwise will delete all the scheduled notifications and sets the ScheduledNotification status asReportStatus.RECALL.

Specified by:
execute in interface org.quartz.Job
Throws:
org.quartz.JobExecutionException

verifyAeReportStatus

public boolean verifyAeReportStatus()
This method will return true, if the status of the Report is still pending.

Returns:
true - when stautus is Report.PENDING
See Also:
Report

deleteSubsequentJobs

public void deleteSubsequentJobs()
This method will delete all the jobs that are available(scheduled for later execution) in the same group (associated to the same ScheduleReport).

Parameters:
context - - The JobExecutionContext

processNotification

public abstract DeliveryStatus processNotification()
This method is to be overriden in the subclasses,and should contain the logic for processing the notification.
